message.content:
I need to identify the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period from the income statement.

Looking at the given income statement for 2024-02-05, I need to find the line item that represents the cost of inventories sold.

In an income statement, the "Cost of Goods Sold" (COGS) represents the direct costs attributable to the production of the goods sold by a company, which includes the cost of the inventories that have been sold during the period.

From the provided income statement, I can see:
- "Cost of Goods Sold" = 2018000.00

This is the line item that represents the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '2018000.00'} }
```
